{{Use dmy dates|date=September 2011}} {{Infobox TV channel | name = Comedy Central | logofile = Comedy Central UK.svg | logosize = 200px | launch = 1 April 2009 | picture format = [[16:9]] ([[SDTV]]) | owner = [[MTV Networks]] ([[Viacom]]) | slogan = Seriously Funny | country = {{flag|New Zealand}} | language = [[English language|English]] | share = | share as of = | web = http://www.comedycentral.co.nz | terr serv 1 = | terr chan 1 = | sat serv 1 = [[SKY Network Television]] | sat chan 1 = Channel 015 | cable serv 1 = [[TelstraClear InHomeTV]] | cable chan 1 = Channel 10 | cable serv 2 = | cable chan 2 = | adsl serv 1 = | adsl chan 1 = }} '''Comedy Central (New Zealand)''' is a 24 hour comedy television channel owned by [[Viacom]], broadcasting to New Zealand. The channel launched on 1 April 2009<ref>[http://ccinsider.comedycentral.com/2008/12/04/comedy-central-to-debut-in-new-zealand-barring-april-fools-bait-n-switch/ Comedy Central to Debut in New Zealand Barring April Foolâs Bait nâ Switch]</ref>. Some programmes available include: *''[[Angry Boys]]'' *''[[Tosh.0]]'' *''[[Get Smart]]'' *''[[Are You Being Served]]'' *''[[Rude Tube]]'' *''[[Smash Cuts]]'' *''[[Saturday Night Live]]'' *''[[Letter To Blanchy]]'' *''[[The Cleveland Show]]'' *''[[American Dad]]'' *''[[Entourage (TV series)|Entourage]]'' *''[[Family Guy]]'' *''[[Comedy Central Roast|Roast]]'' *''[[Married with children]]'' *''[[South Park]]'' *''Stand-up Saturday'' *''The Billy T James Show'' *''[[Friends]]''
